sentences.english: China has reported 1, 537 cases of swine flu with no fatalities to date.
sentences.chinese: 中国迄今共报告了1537例甲流，没有死亡病例。

sentences.english: It is now the highest-grossing independent British film of all time.
sentences.chinese: 如今，这已成为迄今为止最成功的英国独立电影。

sentences.english: The hitherto unutilized amount of the property value is opened for use.
sentences.chinese: 迄今未动用余额的财产价值是开放供使用。

sentences.english: Pieces of cotton in HANGING COFFIN discovered the first kind of cotton textiles in China.
sentences.chinese: 棺中的棉布残片是中国迄今发现最早的棉纺织品实物。

sentences.english: So far, a total of 327 contacts have been identified.
sentences.chinese: 迄今确定的接触者总人数为327人。

sentences.english: This is the first study to ever report such an association.
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今为止首次报道存在这种相关性。

sentences.english: Can you describe one of the best concerts you have ever seen?
sentences.chinese: 你可以描述一下迄今为止你看过的最好的演唱会吗？

sentences.english: Start with an executive summary, based on what you know about the TIMS project so far.
sentences.chinese: 开始执行摘要，根据您迄今了解的TIMS的项目。

sentences.english: So far, there has been no resistance to antileprosy treatment when used as MDT.
sentences.chinese: 迄今，对使用联合化疗的抗麻风治疗无抗药性。

sentences.english: No signs of influenza-like illness have been reported to date.
sentences.chinese: 迄今未报告流感样疾病的迹象。

sentences.english: So far, 952 people have agreed to be notified of their test results by text messenge.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止，已有952人同意通过短信获知检验结果。

sentences.english: Until recently, there were altogether three Nine Dragon Screens in China.
sentences.chinese: 迄今为止在中国总共有三个九龙壁。

sentences.english: There have been no defaults so far, says the company’s founder, Calvin Chin.
sentences.chinese: 距公司创始人陈国权称迄今为止还没有拖欠记录。

sentences.english: I have been in the business for the last ten years， and worked as the superintendent in the personnel department。
sentences.chinese: 本人在过去十年在商界担任人事部主任迄今。

sentences.english: Actinomycete microbes are the most important and largest class of microbes for medicinal usage up to date.
sentences.chinese: 放线菌是迄今最重要和最大的药用微生物种群。

sentences.english: Writing in the journal Nature , the team says this is the deepest-living "multi-cellular" organism known to science.
sentences.chinese: 这是迄今为止发现生活在最深地方的多细胞生物。

definition: before the present/(a long period) ago
(idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
up to/no less than/as much as
